title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When working with binary projects in org.apache.ant, I am not able to see the scoped type hierarchy of the internal JARs. This behavior is confusing and needs clarification.
OB: When I try to view the scoped type hierarchy in a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant), I receive the following message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.'
EB: I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal JARs in the scoped type hierarchy for binary projects like org.apache.ant.
SR: To reproduce this issue, open a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant) and try to view the scoped type hierarchy. The message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'' should appear.
